definition: handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]

sentences.english: Into the lean and slipper'd pantaloon!
sentences.chinese: 變成了精瘦的拖着拖鞋的龍鍾老叟。

sentences.english: I see her, an old woman, weeping for me on the anniversary of this day.
sentences.chinese: 我看見露西成了個龍鍾老婦，在我的祭日爲我哭泣。

sentences.english: Should I look older just to be put on your shelf?
sentences.chinese: 我是否應該讓自己看上去老態龍鍾好讓你放下呢？

sentences.english: But inside he found only a doddering old monk cooking gruel.
sentences.chinese: 想着，走入看時，只有一個龍鍾老僧在那裏煮粥。

sentences.english: Not knowing their own flaws is already doddering attitude.
sentences.chinese: 殊不知自身漏洞百出早已呈老態龍鍾之態。

sentences.english: In the Guangzhou Zoo I saw a South China tiger in its doddering old age.
sentences.chinese: 在廣州動物園我看見一隻老態龍鍾的華南虎。
